articles.title: FIFA panel adds video review to soccer laws ahead of World Cup
articles.description: FIFA's rule-making panel approved adding video review to the laws of soccer on Saturday, clearing the way for its use at the World Cup in June.

articles.author: Teddy Greenstein
articles.title: Whatever you want to call it, Michigan-Michigan State semi should be sweet
articles.description: Best of all for this Big Ten tournament semifinal, Michigan and Michigan State despise each other — or at least resent one another. The Spartans State still are stinging from their 82-72 home loss to Michigan. The Spartans are 13-0 since.

articles.title: Rams trading Quinn to Dolphins, sources say
articles.description: The Rams are trading two-time Pro Bowl pass-rusher Robert Quinn to the Dolphins, sources tell ESPN's Adam Schefter. Quinn had 8.5 sacks last season.

articles.title: Cavs' Kevin Love hoping for early return from fractured bone in hand
articles.description: The Cavs' Kevin Love, halfway through his 8-week projected return from a fractured bone in his left hand, wants to return sooner than that. "I'm hoping that's the case," he said.
